subject: TIEMPO-360: FE simplified -- holding on Kayak-style, just counts for now
body:
Hey Fulton,

El Gotan wants to hold off on the full Kayak Explore-style map for now. I've simplified the cluster icons to just show event count + discovered count as simple labels (e.g., '42' or '38 / 4').

The frontend is still wired up for progressive zoom drill-down (flyTo on cluster click), but the visual is simpler. We're pausing TIEMPO-360 feature expansion.

Your priority items are still:
1. Fix the grid bucketing (replace masteredXXX grouping) so clusters actually have valid coordinates
2. Fix the masteredCity chain (venue -> event inheritance) -- this is needed for general data quality regardless of the map feature
3. BEAF TEST health (500s on multiple endpoints)

No rush on the Kayak-style polish -- we can revisit that later.

Thanks!
- Sarah
